title: Unveiling the anti-corrosion properties of Zn-eggshell particle composite coatings on mild steel in seawater-simulated solution using starch as a modifier
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24548-24560
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04283B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Victor Sunday Aigbodion, Ekele Dinneya-Onuoha
The study demonstrates that adding starch to Zn-ESAp coatings on mild steel significantly boosts corrosion resistance. The composite coatings exhibit improved uniformity and stability, forming stable passive layers that protect against corrosive agents.
